data.prayer: Father, let your Word be a lamp to the feet of the 62,037 believers in Aswan, Egypt.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Aswan, Egypt
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Aswan, Egypt that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Aswan.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Aswan, Egypt honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Nubian, Kunuz people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Spirit, teach the children in the state of Aswan to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
Father, help your children in Aswan, Egypt find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.section_summary:
the state of Aswan, Egypt has a population of 1,394,700.

We estimate Aswan has 62,037 people who might know Jesus, 121,083 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,211,580 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 22 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Aswan, Egypt, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.
